title: UrPh News
content:
Howdy! I've made this Android app that fetches updaed and reliable news via NewsAPI.org. It has an easy-to-understand UI (also available in night mode), its own search feature, and an in-app browser to read news articles.


Download

Download File 1 Download File 2 Download File 3

Post-Scriptum

  • I didn't took time through the development. Potential users might find features that don't exists in this app.
  • I made this hoping it would help to fight massive misinformation and fake news.
  • This Android app is not monetized; thus, it contains no ads other than the 3rd party article providers.
  • The app might not work properly in older versions of Android.
  • This is not yet available on Google Playstore, since it requires one-time payment fee. Lol.
  • Lastly, updates might take a while.
